head.title: Extract {{FileFormatUp}} pages in {{EnvName}}
head.description: Quickly extract specific pages from a {{FileFormatUp}} file using {{ProdFullName}} and save them as a separate document.

header.title: Extract {{FileFormatUp}} pages
header.description: Integrate {{ProdFullName}} into your {{EnvNameShort}} applications to efficiently process {{FileFormatUp}} files with advanced page extraction features.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdShortName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a powerful document processing library that supports over 50 file formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and images. It enables seamless operations like merging, splitting, extracting, reordering, and deleting pages.

more_features.title: Versatile document processing
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} provides robust functionality for working with over 50 widely used business document formats.

feature_1.title: Merge multiple file types
feature_1.content: Combine PDFs, Word documents, PowerPoint slides, Excel sheets, images, and archives into a single file with customizable options.

feature_2.title: Advanced page management
feature_2.content: Easily move, remove, or reorder pages within a document to organize your content effectively.

feature_3.title: Modify page layout
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to any angle or switch between portrait and landscape orientation as needed.

feature_4.title: Extract specific pages
feature_4.content: Select and extract only the required pages, saving them as a new document for further use.

formats.title: Extract pages from multiple file formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 file formats, making document management more flexible and efficient.

examples.comment_1: Create an instance of {{ProdShortName}} with the source document
examples.comment_2: Define extraction settings for specific pages
examples.comment_4: Save the extracted pages as a new file

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) makes it simple to extract pages from {{FileFormatUp}} documents. Enhance your {{EnvName}} applications with seamless document processing capabilities.
content.step_1: Provide the file path of the source {{FileFormatUp}} document.
content.step_2: Select the pages you want to extract.
content.step_4: Save the extracted pages as a separate document.

code_1.title: Extract specific pages from a document
code_1.content: This example shows how to extract a selected range of pages from a {{FileFormatUp}} file and save them as a new document.
code_1.comment_1: Specify the file path of the original document
code_1.comment_2: Define options to extract only even-numbered pages from the selected range
code_1.comment_4: Save the extracted pages to a new file
